amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow operators to continue new oil and gas development in the proposed exclusionary zone if operators have previously been in accordance with the Historic Preservation Act as well as existing rules and regulations for archaeological sites and areas of sensitivity in Chaco Canyon Historical Park.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part E of House Report 116-264 to allow operators to continue new oil and gas development in the proposed exclusionary zone if operators have previously been in accordance with the Historic Preservation Act as well as existing rules and regulations for archaeological sites and areas of sensitivity in Chaco Canyon Historical Park.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 245 (Roll no. 595).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 245 (Roll no. 595).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Arrington.
